parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value>  Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Hides dead body of the given unit. After a short delay, the body slowly sinks into the ground. After awhile, when group of the unit becomes [[grpNull]], the body gets deleted and becomes [[objNull]]. If applied to alive unit, nothing happens until unit dies, then the unit's body gets hidden. If a dead unit is human player, the body is hidden but not deleted until player respawns.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hideBody''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - person

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hideBody]] player1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[deleteVehicle]], [[setDamage]], [[addToRemainsCollector]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
